name: Air Balloon
description:
Challenge your brain with an amazing color match!

Choose your air balloon and rise up as much as you can by matching the color to one of the circles. Аs you play the weather changes and this makes playing even more difficult.

The actual released version on Google Play is for feedbacks, so feel free to comment what you like, what you dislike. Тhanks to you, I can improve the concept and build a better game!

If you can install it, rate and write short positive review, your support would mean a lot to me!

Thanks in advance!
